https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2gQaZQ6REriS7Gclv1akT5Urwgf.jpg For the past four years, San Francisco cop Jack Cates has been after an unidentified drug kingpin who calls himself the Ice Man. Jack finds a picture that proves that the Ice Man has put a price on the head of Reggie Hammond, who is scheduled to be released from prison on the next day. Another 48 Hrs.
